<seg sID="C16_app9-fMS"/> of our <lb n="c56-0119__main__3"/>guides, was <seg eID="C16_app9-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app10-fMS"/> fine <seg eID="C16_app10-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app11-fMS"/> although clouded. <seg eID="C16_app11-fMS"/>

<seg sID="C16_app17-fMS"/> evening <sga-add eID="c56-0119__main__d5e24716"/><mod eID="c56-0119__main__d5e24709"/> . <seg eID="C16_app17-fMS"/> These sublime and <lb n="c56-0119__main__6"/>magnificent scenes afforded me the greatest <lb n="c56-0119__main__7"/>consolation that I was capable of <seg sID="C16_app19-fMS"/> receiving <seg eID="C16_app19-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0119__main__8"/>They elevated me from <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0119__main__d5e24727"/>all <sga-add eID="c56-0119__main__d5e24727"/>littleness of <seg sID="C16_app22-fMS"/> feeling <seg eID="C16_app22-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0119__main__9"/>and although they <seg sID="C16_app24-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0119__main__d5e24732">d</del> did not remove my <seg eID="C16_app24-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app25-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0119__main__10"/>grief <seg eID="C16_app25-fMS"/> they <seg sID="C16_app27-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0119__main__d5e24738">t</del> subdued and <seg eID="C16_app27-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app28-fMS"/> tranquilized <seg eID="C16_app28-fMS"/> it. <lb n="c56-0119__main__11"/>In some degree, <seg sID="C16_app30-fMS"/> also <seg eID="C16_app30-fMS"/> they diverted my mind <lb n="c56-0119__main__12"/>from the thoughts <seg sID="C16_app32-fMS"/> <mod sID="c56-0119__main__d5e24748"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0119__main__d5e24750"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0119__main__d5e24750"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0119__main__d5e24756"/>over which <seg eID="C16_app32-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0119__main__d5e24756"/><mod eID="c56-0119__main__d5e24748"/>it had brooded <seg sID="C16_app34-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0119__main__d5e24761">over</del> <lb n="c56-0119__main__13"/>for the last <seg eID="C16_app34-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app35-fMS"/> month <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0119__main__d5e24766">s</del> . <seg eID="C16_app35-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app36-fMS"/> I returned in the <lb n="c56-0119__main__14"/>evening, <seg eID="C16_app36-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app37-fMS"/> fatigued <seg eID="C16_app37-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app38-fMS"/> but less <seg eID="C16_app38-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app39-fMS"/> unhappy <seg eID="C16_app39-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app40-fMS"/> and <seg eID="C16_app40-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app41-fMS"/> convered <seg eID="C16_app41-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app42-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0119__main__15"/>with <seg eID="C16_app42-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app43-fMS"/> the <seg eID="C16_app43-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app44-fMS"/> family <seg eID="C16_app44-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app45-fMS"/> <del type="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0119__main__d5e24773">t</del> with more cheerfulness than <seg eID="C16_app45-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app46-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0119__main__16"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0119__main__d5e24779">I</del> had been <seg eID="C16_app46-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app47-fMS"/> <mod sID="c56-0119__main__d5e24782"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0119__main__d5e24784">accustomed</del> <mdel>to</mdel> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0119__main__d5e24789"/>my custom <seg eID="C16_app47-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app48-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0119__main__d5e24789"/><mod eID="c56-0119__main__d5e24782"/>for some time. <seg eID="C16_app48-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app49-fMS"/> My <w ana="start"/>fa<lb n="c56-0119__main__17"/>ther<w ana="end"/> was pleased and Elizabeth overjoyed; <seg eID="C16_app49-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app50-fMS"/> "My <lb n="c56-0119__main__18"/>dear Cousin," said she, "You see what happiness <lb n="c56-0119__main__19"/>you diffuse when you are <seg eID="C16_app50-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app51-fMS"/> <mod sID="c56-0119__main__d5e24804"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0119__main__d5e24806">cheerful</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0119__main__d5e24809"/>happy <sga-add eID="c56-0119__main__d5e24809"/><mod eID="c56-0119__main__d5e24804"/> ; <seg eID="C16_app51-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app52-fMS"/> do <lb n="c56-0119__main__20"/>not relapse <seg eID="C16_app52-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app53-fMS"/> again!— <seg eID="C16_app53-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app54-fMS"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0119__main__21"/>The following morning <seg eID="C16_app54-fMS"/> the rain <seg sID="C16_app56-fMS"/> poured <lb n="c56-0119__main__22"/>down <seg eID="C16_app56-fMS"/> in <seg sID="C16_app58-fMS"/> torrents <seg eID="C16_app58-fMS"/> and thick mists hid <lb n="c56-0119__main__23"/>the summits of <seg sID="C16_app60-fMS"/> the mountains. I rose <seg eID="C16_app60-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app61-fMS"/> early <seg eID="C16_app61-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app62-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0119__main__24"/>but felt unusually melancholy. The rain <lb n="c56-0119__main__25"/>depressed <seg eID="C16_app62-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app63-fMS"/> <mod sID="c56-0119__main__d5e24828"/> <mdel>my</mdel> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0119__main__d5e24832"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0119__main__d5e24832"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0119__main__d5e24838"/>me <sga-add eID="c56-0119__main__d5e24838"/><mod eID="c56-0119__main__d5e24828"/> , <seg eID="C16_app63-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app64-fMS"/> my old feelings <seg eID="C16_app64-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app65-fMS"/> recurred <seg eID="C16_app65-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app66-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0119__main__26"/>and I was miserable. I knew how <seg eID="C16_app66-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app68-fMS"/> my father <lb n="c56-0119__main__27"/>would be <seg eID="C16_app68-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app69-fMS"/> dissapointed at this sudden <seg eID="C16_app69-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app70-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0119__main__28"/>change <seg eID="C16_app70-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app71-fMS"/> and I wished to avoid him <seg eID="C16_app71-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app72-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0119__main__29"/>untill <seg eID="C16_app72-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app73-fMS"/> I had <seg eID="C16_app73-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app74-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0119__main__d5e24851">rev</del> recovered myself so far <lb n="c56-0119__main__30"/>as <seg eID="C16_app74-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app76-fMS"/> to conceal <seg eID="C16_app76-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app77-fMS"/> the <seg eID="C16_app77-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app78-fMS"/> feelings that overpowered <seg eID="C16_app78-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app79-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0119__main__31"/>me — <seg eID="C16_app79-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app80-fMS"/> I knew that they would remain <lb n="c56-0119__main__32"/>that day at the <seg eID="C16_app80-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app81-fMS"/> inn <seg eID="C16_app81-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app82-fMS"/> and as I had <seg eID="C16_app82-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app83-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0120__main__1"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0120__main__d5e24871">n</del> ever inured myself to <seg eID="C16_app83-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app84-fMS"/> rain <seg eID="C16_app84-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app85-fMS"/> and <seg eID="C16_app85-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app86-fMS"/> cold <seg eID="C16_app86-fMS"/> I <lb n="c56-0120__main__2"/>resolved <seg sID="C16_app88-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0120__main__d5e24876">t</del> to <seg eID="C16_app88-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app89-fMS"/> go <seg eID="C16_app89-fMS"/> to the summit of <seg sID="C16_app92-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0120__main__3"/>Montanvert <mod sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24882"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0120__main__d5e24884">by myself</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24887"/>alone <sga-add eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24887"/><mod eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24882"/> . <seg eID="C16_app92-fMS"/> I remembered <lb n="c56-0120__main__4"/>the effect the view of the tremendous <lb n="c56-0120__main__5"/>and <seg sID="C16_app96-fMS"/> ever moving <seg eID="C16_app96-fMS"/> glacier had <seg sID="C16_app98-fMS"/> <mod sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24895"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0120__main__d5e24897">had</del> <anchor xml:id="c56-0120.01"/><lb n="c56-0120__left_margin__1"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" sID="c56-0120__left_margin__d5e24906"/>produced <sga-add eID="c56-0120__left_margin__d5e24906"/><mod eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24895"/><lb n="c56-0120__main__6"/>upon my mind when I first saw <seg eID="C16_app98-fMS"/> it <seg sID="C16_app101-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0120__main__7"/><mod sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24916"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0120__main__d5e24918">how</del> <mod sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24921"/> <mdel>i</mdel> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24925"/>I <sga-add eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24925"/><mod eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24921"/><mod eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24916"/> t had then filled me with <lb n="c56-0120__main__8"/>a sublime <seg eID="C16_app101-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app102-fMS"/> extacy <seg eID="C16_app102-fMS"/> that gave wings <lb n="c56-0120__main__9"/>to the <seg sID="C16_app104-fMS"/> soul <seg eID="C16_app104-fMS"/> and allowed <seg sID="C16_app106-fMS"/> <mod sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24934"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24936"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24936"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24942"/>it <seg eID="C16_app106-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24942"/><mod eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24934"/>to soar from <lb n="c56-0120__main__10"/>the <seg sID="C16_app108-fMS"/> <mod sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24948"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0120__main__d5e24950">lower</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24953"/>obscure <seg eID="C16_app108-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24953"/><mod eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24948"/>world to light & joy. The <lb n="c56-0120__main__11"/>sight of the awful & majestic in <lb n="c56-0120__main__12"/>nature had indeed always the effect <lb n="c56-0120__main__13"/>of <seg sID="C16_app110-fMS"/> <mod sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24964"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0120__main__d5e24966">tranquillizing the</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24969"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark><sga-add eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24969"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24975"/>solemnizing <sga-add eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24975"/> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24978"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <seg eID="C16_app110-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24978"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24984"/>my <seg sID="C16_app112-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24984"/><mod eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24964"/> mind <seg eID="C16_app112-fMS"/> & causing <lb n="c56-0120__main__14"/>me to forget the <seg sID="C16_app114-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0120__main__d5e24990">the</del> passing cares <lb n="c56-0120__main__15"/>of life. I determined to go <seg eID="C16_app114-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app115-fMS"/> <mod sID="c56-0120__main__d5e24996"/> <mdel>f</mdel> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0120__main__d5e25000">by myself</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0120__main__d5e25003"/>alone <seg eID="C16_app115-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0120__main__d5e25003"/><mod eID="c56-0120__main__d5e24996"/><lb n="c56-0120__main__16"/>for I was well acquainted with the <seg sID="C16_app117-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0120__main__17"/>path <seg eID="C16_app117-fMS"/> and the presence of another <seg sID="C16_app119-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0120__main__18"/><mod sID="c56-0120__main__d5e25013"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0120__main__d5e25015">had the effect of</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0120__main__d5e25018"/>would <seg eID="C16_app119-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0120__main__d5e25018"/><mod eID="c56-0120__main__d5e25013"/>destroy <seg sID="C16_app121-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0120__main__d5e25023">ing</del> the <seg eID="C16_app121-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app122-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0120__main__d5e25026">solitary</del> <lb n="c56-0120__main__19"/>solitary grandeur of the scene. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0120__main__20"/>The ascent <seg eID="C16_app122-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app123-fMS"/> <mod sID="c56-0120__main__d5e25038"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0120__main__d5e25040">to the mountain</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0120__main__d5e25043"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0120__main__d5e25043"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0120__main__d5e25049"/>is <seg eID="C16_app123-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C16_app124-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0120__main__d5e25049"/><mod eID="c56-0120__main__d5e25038"/><w ana="start"/>pre<lb n="c56-0120__main__21"/>cipitous<w ana="end"/><mod sID="c56-0120__main__d5e25059"/> <mdel>w</mdel> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0120__main__d5e25063"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0120__main__d5e25063"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0120__main__d5e25069">with</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0120__main__d5e25072"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <seg eID="C16_app124-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0120__main__d5e25072"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0120__main__d5e25078"/>but <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0120__main__d5e25080"/>the path is <sga-add eID="c56-0120__main__d5e25080"/>cut into <sga-add eID="c56-0120__main__d5e25078"/><mod eID="c56-0120__main__d5e25059"/>continual and short <seg sID="C16_app128-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0120__main__22"/>windings <seg eID="C16_app128-fMS"/> which enable <seg sID="C16_app130-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0120__main__d5e25088">s</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0120__main__d5e25091">to</del> you <seg eID="C16_app130-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0120__main__23"/>surmount the <seg sID="C16_app133-fMS"/> perpedicularity <seg eID="C16_app133-fMS"/> of <lb n="c56-0120__main__24"/>the <seg sID="C16_app135-fMS"/> mountains– <seg eID="C16_app135-fMS"/> It is a scene <seg sID="C16_app137-fMS"/> terrifical<lb n="c56-0120__main__25"/>ly <seg eID="C16_app137-fMS"/> desolate.
